text: @HoarseWisperer @realDonaldTrump While you're here Mr "President" sir, I've had lots of letters telling me that a couple of lines of leftover 1980's blow taken with the hydroxychloroquine and morbid obesity will absolutely prevent you from getting coronavirus. Lots of letters sir. Beautiful letters.
